category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 6 (Duties of Members)
contents: Article 6 (Obligations of Committee Members) ① Committee members must disclose confidential or undisclosed information learned while performing their duties (information that may have a significant impact on the judgment of whether to acquire property or property interests) before it is disclosed to an unspecified number of people. must not be used for personal gain or disclosed to a third party. Revised September 16, 2022. ② Newly appointed members must complete the Integrity Pledge in Form No. 10 and submit it to the department in charge of examination request work, and all members must comply with it. Revised September 16, 2022. ③ In order to maintain the fairness and objectivity of deliberation by the review committee, members must not participate in job-related research services ordered by the Corporation during the period of appointment. Revised 2022. 9. 16.
